name: New Applications Discovered
description: Notify source owners that new applications have been discovered from a discovery source.
subject: $AppCount new applications discovered from $DiscoverySourceName
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

$AppCount new applications were discovered from the $DiscoverySourceName source.

#foreach($app in $AppNames)#end
ApplicationDiscovery SourceDiscovery Source Type
$app$DiscoverySourceName$DiscoverySource

View the discovered applications.

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
